g-0: ^"I was trying to find a new place to scavenge... the floor fell through. Ended up here."
^You push yourself too hard, Josh. I'll look for a way out.

FRIENDLY: ^"There's a door down the way. I'm too hurt to continue, but if you do find a way out, maybe you can get help."
INSULTED: ^"I'm already hurt, I don't need you to yell. I just need you to find a way out."
